org.eclipse.persistence.oxm.mappings
Interface XMLNillableMapping

All Known Implementing Classes:
XMLBinaryDataCollectionMapping, XMLBinaryDataMapping, XMLCompositeCollectionMapping, XMLCompositeDirectCollectionMapping, XMLCompositeObjectMapping, XMLDirectMapping, XMLFragmentMapping
public interface XMLNillableMapping

INTERNAL All nillable mappings which can be added to org.eclipse.persistence.oxm.XMLDescriptor must implement this interface.
The default policy is AbstractNullPolicy.

See Also:
org.eclipse.persistence.oxm.mappings
